languages.text: {n}Вокс одержимого начинает вторить вам — но слова, звучащие из него, искажены, мерзостны и полны насмешки. Синтетические мышцы напрягаются, выгибая тело дугой, и вы готовы поклясться, что слышите, как с тихим противным визгом лопаются растянутые сухожилия несчастного.{/n}

{n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс одержимого начинает вторить вам — но слова, звучащие из него, искажены, мерзостны и полны насмешки. Синтетические мышцы напрягаются, выгибая тело дугой, и вы готовы поклясться, что слышите, как с тихим противным визгом лопаются растянутые сухожилия несчастного.{/n}

{n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Vox des Besessenen beginnt, deine Worte zu wiederholen, allerdings auf spöttisch verzerrte Weise. Die synthetischen Muskeln spannen sich an, der ganze Körper biegt sich. Du könntest schwören, dass du mit einem leisen, widerwärtigen Schnalzen hörst, wie die angespannten Sehnen des armen Mannes reißen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox des Besessenen beginnt, deine Worte zu wiederholen, allerdings auf spöttisch verzerrte Weise. Die synthetischen Muskeln spannen sich an, der ganze Körper biegt sich. Du könntest schwören, dass du mit einem leisen, widerwärtigen Schnalzen hörst, wie die angespannten Sehnen des armen Mannes reißen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vox de l'homme possédé reprend vos paroles en les déformant de façon grotesque. Ses muscles synthétiques se contractent et son corps se tend. Vous avez l'impression d'entendre les tendons du malheureux se briser dans un claquement atroce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox de l'homme possédé reprend vos paroles en les déformant de façon grotesque. Ses muscles synthétiques se contractent et son corps se tend. Vous avez l'impression d'entendre les tendons du malheureux se briser dans un claquement atroce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}被附身的技术神甫重复着你的祷词，但他的声音最终还是被腐化扭曲了。他绷紧了合成肌肉，身体高高拱起，肌腱被拉伸到极致。随后，你听到了非常安静，但却令人恐惧的断裂声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}被附身的技术祭司重复着你的祷词，但他的声音最终还是被腐化扭曲了。他绷紧了合成肌肉，身体高高拱起，肌腱被拉伸到极致。随后，你听到了非常安静，但却令人恐惧的断裂声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}はりつけにされた男のヴォクスはこちらの言葉を繰り返すものの、不快にあざけるような声でその言葉を歪める。合成筋肉が強張り、体が弧を描く。静かながらもゾッとする悲鳴と共に、不運な男の腱が伸ばされ、パキリと折れる音がしっかりと聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}張り付けの男のヴォクスはこちらの言葉を繰り返すものの、不快に真似た声でその言葉を歪める。合成筋肉が強張って、体が弧を描いた。静かにゾッとする悲鳴と共に、不幸な男の腱が伸ばされてパキリと折れる音がしっかりと聞こえた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El voco del poseído se hace eco de las palabras que dices, pero distorsionando su sonido en una burla vil. Los músculos sintéticos se tensan, arqueando el cuerpo. Se podría jurar que se oyen los tendones estirados del desgraciado romperse con un chirrido silencioso y repugnante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco del poseído se hace eco de las palabras que dices, pero distorsionando su sonido en una burla vil. Los músculos sintéticos se tensan, arqueando el cuerpo. Se podría jurar que se oyen los tendones estirados del desgraciado romperse con un chirrido silencioso y repugnante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ele geçirilen adamın voksu, sarf ettiğin sözcükleri bir ayna gibi yansıtsa da tınılarında habis bir alay var. Sentetik kaslar kasılıyor ve vücut kamburlaşıyor. Talihsiz adamın gerili kas kirişlerinin mide kaldıran belli belirsiz bir ses çıkararak kopuşuna tanıklık ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The possessed man's vox takes to echoing back the words you say, but distorting their sound in foul mockery. The synthetic muscles tense up, arching the body. You could swear you hear the unfortunate man's stretched tendons snap with a quiet, revolting screech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ele geçirilen adamın voksu, ağzından çıkan sözcükleri bir ayna gibi yansıtıyor ancak kelimeler, günahkâr bir istihzayla bozuluyor. Sentetik kasları kasılıyor ve vücudu kamburlaşıyor. Talihsiz adamın sinirlerinin, iğrenç, tiz bir ses çıkararak kopuşunu duyduğuna inanıyorsun.{/n}
